actions.text: Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.  Report No: 98-634.

Committee on Rules Granted an Open Rule Providing One Hour of General Debate; Making in Order the Amendment Recommended by the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries; Waiving all Points of Order Against Said Amendment.
Rules Committee Resolution H.Res.471 Reported to House.
Called up by House by Rule.
House Agreed to Amendments Adopted by the Committee of the Whole.
Passed House (Amended) by Yea-Nay Vote: 307 - 89 (Record Vote No: 78).
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Panama Canal and Outer Continental Shelf

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1985 for the operation and maintenance of the Panama Canal, and for other purposes.
short_title: Panama Canal Appropriations Authorization Act, Fiscal Year 1985

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended, roll call #78 (307-89)) Panama Canal Appropriations Authorization Act, Fiscal Year 1985 - Authorizes appropriations for the Panama Canal Commission for FY 1985 for: (1) operating expenses; (2) capital outlay; and (3) reimbursement of other agencies. Authorizes additional appropriations for the Commission for FY 1985 as may be necessary for specified purposes. Directs the President to try to continue the availability after FY 1984 of military postal services, commissaries and military exchanges to all employees of the Panama Canal Commission who are U.S. citizens and their dependents. Authorizes appropriations to compensate such employees if the availability of such services, commissaries, and exchanges is not continued.
